mapper.select: SELECT TG_NUM, TG_TITLE, TG_REGDATE, TG_ID, TG_CNT, TG_CONTENT, R FROM (SELECT TG_NUM, TG_TITLE, TG_REGDATE, TG_ID, TG_CNT, TG_CONTENT, ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT TG_NUM, TG_TITLE, TG_REGDATE, TG_ID, TG_CNT, TG_CONTENT FROM TOGETHER ORDER BY TG_REGDATE DESC) ) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 4
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TG_NUM DESC) RNUM, TG_NUM, TG_TITLE, TG_REGDATE, TG_ID, TG_CNT FROM TOGETHER ORDER BY TG_NUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TOGETHER SET TG_CNT = NVL(TG_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE TG_NUM = #{TG_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT TG_NUM, TG_CNT, TG_ID, TG_REGDATE, TG_TITLE, TG_CONTENT FROM TOGETHER WHERE TG_NUM = #{TG_NUM}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOGETHER VALUES( TG_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{TG_TITLE}, SYSDATE, #{TG_ID}, 0, #{TG_CONTENT} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TOGETHER WHERE TG_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR TG_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TG_NUM DESC) RNUM, TG_NUM, TG_TITLE, TG_REGDATE, TG_ID, TG_CNT, TG_LIKE, TG_CONTENT FROM TOGETHER WHERE TG_ID = #{MEM_ID}
